title: Day 1222
content:
# Day 1222

An account
on the app which used to be known
as the bird app
but is now just X
writes like this
and I find the style
to be of interest.

Short, sweet...
to the point

The way you work the medium
is of great importance
if you want your message
to resonate with maximum impact.

Personally, this style is not for me
at least not long term
it feels a bit schizo.

Yet all of the goats 
are schizo in their own way.

So I guess,
do with that information 
what you will.

I'll end today 
by noting I played a game
of pickleball
at a place
called toon town pickleball.

It was quite cool
and now I want my own warehouse
in the heart of downtown
one day, it will be mine.

Stack sats,
stay humble.

7/26/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
